title: Drawing, "Two elevations of understructure of carriages", 1780
medium: Pen and black ink, traces of graphite, brush and wash on white laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed in ink, left: Elevation du cou,/ de signe vue de/ profils, avecque/ ... right of image ... 18 poue ...; right: notier du Lisoire.; right of image: Elevation du Lisoire et/ du cou de signe/ vue de face.
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Front and side views of understructure of carriages. Scale below.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Two elevations of understructure of carriages", 1780.
1780. Pen and black ink, traces of graphite, brush and wash on white laid paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1911-28-191.
